name: 3D Monster Maze (itch)
description:
Multiplayer shooter game in unlimited mazes (that you can choose from)  - with surprises and power-ups! Dinosaur power-up anyone?!

Doors, spikes, platforms, weather, and more!

In development - let me know how we can make this game better and better on the community page...

Let's add more power-ups and more fun!
